name: Day of the death
description:
On the Day of the Death, the barriers between life and death are erased. Our protagonist named Pablo goes to the family altar to remember his loved ones. As he observes the paintings, he is transported to the world of the dead where he fights devil spirits and discovers the roots of his family.

The project has been developed in the Global Gamejam 2023, the objective was to develop a videogame in 48h.
